Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: errors indicated channel creation failure. can you give more details on how this error came about?

Action.body: hi, have you fixed this problem? I just got the same error.

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: ~ghaskins ~swangbj can you provide more details on how this was reproduced? clearly this worked in the CI build and end-2-end FIT tests.

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: closing it as it's very much likely to have been fixed by now. please give the latest a try and if happening again please re-open and provide more details on how to reproduce.

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: need more details on how this was reproduced. note that there is no good indicator that the channel has been successfully created by the orderer. so you have to wait some length of time before calling join channel. that's what the e2e.js test does, waiting 5 seconds. it's not pretty but is the easiest solution. you could also keep polling until you get the expected block (within a set timeout)

Action.author: ivanjjill
Action.body: orderer.js_ : sendDeliver.on('data'... it returns status 'NOT_FOUND' hope that helps >
